The Nile Rediscovered | Innovative Travel | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP The Nile Rediscovered 12 Days | 7 Nights Nile Cruise Embark on a captivating 12-day luxury holiday in Egypt, where you'll delve into the marvels of this ancient land. Begin your journey with a two-night stay near the Pyramids, enjoying breathtaking views of these historic wonders. Explore the enigmatic city of Cairo with your personal Egyptologist, then unwind on a seven-night deluxe Nile Cruise, allowing plenty of leisurely time to discover the stunning landscapes and archaeological gems along the legendary River Nile. Wrap up this exceptional adventure with two nights in downtown Cairo, perfectly balancing luxury, cultural immersion, and rejuvenation. Deal Details Travel Dates 01 May 2025 - 14 Sep 2026 Priced From $8,592 per person Enquire Now Description Embark on a captivating 12-day luxury holiday in Egypt, where you'll delve into the marvels of this ancient land. Begin your journey with a two-night stay near the Pyramids, enjoying breathtaking views of these historic wonders. Explore the enigmatic city of Cairo with your personal Egyptologist, then unwind on a seven-night deluxe Nile Cruise, allowing plenty of leisurely time to discover the stunning landscapes and archaeological gems along the legendary River Nile. Wrap up this exceptional adventure with two nights in downtown Cairo, perfectly balancing luxury, cultural immersion, and rejuvenation. Pricing 1 May 2026 to 14 Sep 2026 Deluxe Class from $8,592* per person, twin share 8 Jan 2026 to 24 Mar 2026, 11 Apr to 30 Apr 2026 Deluxe Class From $10,120* per person, twin share 10 Dec 2025 to 7 Jan 2026 Deluxe Class From $13,441 per person, twin share 25 Mar 2026 to 10 Apr 2026 Deluxe Class from $13,054 per person, twin share Itinerary Day 1 Cairo Day 2 Cairo Day 3 Cairo - Luxor Day 4 Luxor - Esna Day 5 Esna - Edfu - Kom Ombo Day 6 Kom Ombo - Aswan Day 7 Aswan - Kom Ombo - Edfu Day 8 Aswan - Kon Ombo - Edfu - Esna Day 9 Esna - Luxor Day 10 Luxor - Cairo Day 11 Cairo Day 12 Cairo Tour Highlights Highlights include Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx Memphis and the monuments of Sakkara Deluxe 7 night cruise along the Nile Valley of the Kings, including the tomb of the renowned young pharaoh, Tutankhamun Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM). Inclusions VIP Meet and assistance prior to immigration at Cairo Airport Egyptian Visa for US, Canadian, New Zealand, Australian and UK Passport holders Airport departure assistance Private transfers in A/C transportation Accommodation in selected category with private facilities 2N Cairo Pyramids area; 7N Nile Cruise; 2N Cairo downtown area Breakfast daily; all meals on Nile Cruise Economy Class domestic flights Cairo/Luxor/Cairo Private Egyptologist guide and sightseeing in Cairo Small group guided sightseeing on the Nile Cruise Entrance Fees Upgraded entry to the Valley of the Kings including entrance to Tutunkhamun's and Ramses VI Tombs Travel Notes – issued by Innovative Travel Exclusions International airfares Optional tours and excursions Port Taxes and fuel surcharges Porterage Tipping/Gratuities (please refer to tour notes for a recommended guideline) Personal Expenses Departure taxes Hotel charges for minibar or any extra charges Egyptian Visa for non US, Canadian, New Zealand, Australian and UK Passport holders Any other services not clearly mentioned in the inclusions above Terms & Conditions Trip prices and dates are correct at the time of the website going live, however all offers are subject to reconfirmation at the time of booking. All featured tour itineraries and offers maybe subject to change due to seasonal variations without notice, or due to local conditions or other conditions. Please confirm all details at time of booking. Travel insurance is mandatory for all Innovative Travel bookings. All passports must be valid for 6 months prior to your return to your home country. Visas are the responsibility of the traveller. Special VIP meet and assist offers are valid for New Zealand passport holders, for other nationalities please check at the time of booking. For full terms and conditions, please contact your World Travellers consultant. Professional Service Fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
